text: hello this is Bill Cunningham reporting
from the streets of new york as they
empty for the first of the three summer
holidays come memorial day light colors
definitely replace all the other colors
and at one time of course we all know
that was everyone changed to wearing
white and straw hats well all of that's
there but now it's all mixed with shades
of white and it's it's marvelous and all
the bits and pieces so the rules still
stand come Memorial Day you change of
course the real New Yorkers I can tell
you right now by Tuesday after memorial
weekend light colors they're already
going to be panicking and they'll start
appearing in all black but that's that's
their problem and the idea is it's hot
and people are addressing in light
colors now what I found really
interesting were the t-shirts with the
difference there was a young woman I saw
crossing on a way to work on Fifth
Avenue and the t-shirt the neck line had
been cut wider and then it had a kind of
a transparent like net surrounding it
and on the shoulders it had miniature
little ruffles like shoulder pads but it
was a t-shirt underneath and then there
was a young man with the t-shirt rather
than the form fitting ones his seemed to
allow air between the body and the cloth
and everywhere I looked it was the
mixture of off-white ivory eggshell
whether it was pants long dresses short
dresses I saw one wonderful one with a
beige jacket with metal like shoulder
pads fashion is definitely totally
different for when the rules of Memorial
Day when it all became white in a store
half the elements are there but they're
all mixed up its a mix not to put you
off to have fun
and I thought of all the things in the
city parks and wonderful places to go
and spend some time over the memorial
weekend Madison Square Park which is at
twenty-third Street a sculptor has put
are just absolutely glorious 15-story hi
sculptured head I don't know what it's
made of from a distance it looks like
white marble but oh it's it's perfectly
wonderful so we're off to a new start
even before summer officially arrives
but the whole fashion spectrum is
totally changed as it always does a
memorial weekend so you mix it up
yourself have fun with it and we'll see
you next week
you
